events.message: I received the wrong size of the jacket I ordered and would like to get a refund rather than an exchange.
The issue has been categorized as Refund due to the customer's request for money back on an incorrect item.
The case has been assigned to our returns specialist team for further handling.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the size issue with your jacket. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide a photo of the jacket’s size tag as well as your order number to start the refund?
Attached are the photos of the jacket’s size tag and my order confirmation email for your reference.
Thank you for the photos. We will initiate a full refund to your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for the update. I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving the refund soon.
The refund process has been completed successfully. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund. Please reach out if there are any issues.
Since your refund has been processed and no issues were reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting us.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey via email. We appreciate your feedback to improve our service.
